Articles.Content:
Objective: Get As Far From Kerbol As You Can Just Using 5 Engines (no launch clamp wizardry!) Rules: To Enter You MUST include a picture of your craft in the vab, on the launchpad, in orbit (just above kerbin if using more "Agressive" plan) and out of fuel (both the ship and orbit) or make a video (no cuting out the burns) BONUS POINTS Based on speed

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-19T22:57:25Z" title="06/19/2015 10:57  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 19, 2015</time> by dewkiller72**
This seems too easy. Just get on Kerbolar escape velocity and time warp.

Yeah, it's demonstrably simple to get into orbit on a single mammoth, and then you can just use a nuclear engine to go pretty much anywhere. That's 2 engines to anywhere.

- - - Updated - - -

Now if the goal were 5 engines to highest V-infinity, then that would be interesting.
